g.text: 1.3.0. DFSP1 sends a Prepare Transfer request to DFSP2 - Prepare Position Failure
Route & Publishe Prepare event for Payer
Ensure that event is replicated as configured (ACKS=all)
Respond replication acknoledgements have been received
Consume Prepare event message for Payer
Route & Publish Position event for Payer
Consume Position event message for Payer
Request latest position from DB for Payer
Retrieve latest position from DB for Payer
Calculate latest position (lpos) by incrementing transfer for prepare
Validate Calculated latest position against the net-debit cap (netcap) - Rule: lpos < netcap
Publish Notification (failure) event for Payer (handled by seperate process)
